description: HTTP client infrastructure with Dio integration, request/response interceptors, and comprehensive error handling

components.ApiClient: Singleton HTTP client service providing comprehensive REST API functionality with Dio integration.

components.ApiException: Custom exception class for structured API error handling with status codes and data payload support.

rules: Singleton pattern implementation ensuring single HTTP client instance across application.
Dio integration with comprehensive BaseOptions: 30-second timeouts, JSON headers, base URL configuration.
Request/response interceptor system with detailed logging for debug mode and production-safe operation.
Authentication token management with Bearer token support and automatic header injection.
Comprehensive HTTP methods support: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE with full parameter and options support.
Error handling with DioException transformation to custom ApiException for consistent error management.
Debug logging with request/response details including headers, data, and error information.
Unauthorized (401) handling hook for token refresh or logout scenarios.
Connection timeout, send timeout, receive timeout handling with appropriate error messages.
Cancel token support for request cancellation and cleanup.
Generic response type support with proper typing for API responses.
Query parameters support for GET requests with proper URL encoding.
Request body support for POST/PUT requests with JSON serialization.
Options parameter support for custom request configuration overrides.
Status code extraction and message parsing from error responses.
Network error categorization: timeout, bad response, cancellation, unknown errors.
Secure token storage integration hooks (TODO implementation placeholders).
Professional error transformation with meaningful messages and status codes.
Future-ready architecture with extensible interceptor and middleware support.
Production-ready configuration with debug mode conditional logging.
